channel.title: Please anyone help me with this!

item.title: Please anyone help me with this!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[code]
if(i == 13887)
{
class8.aString170 = “Vesta’s Chainbody”;
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;

}

item.source: Please anyone help me with this!

item.title: Please anyone help me with this!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:3, topic:309457”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=405908.msg3000263#msg3000263 date=1255913918]
Your missing a bracket somewhere.
[/quote]
or he has more brackets then he needs^^[/quote]

Well depending on what bracket, it can result in a “reached and of file while parsing” error. So typically this means missing.

Read full topic
item.source: Please anyone help me with this!
